sentence.Network_en: Here a new style of heraldry seems to be developing.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种新型的标志学正在形成.

sentence.Network_en: Letters came, with armorial seals upon them, though of bearings unknown to English heraldry.
sentence.Network_cn: 寄来的信件上印有纹章, 不过那是英格兰家系上所没有记载的.

sentence.Network_en: In heraldry, orange is symbolic of strength and endurance.
sentence.Network_cn: 在纹章学中, 橙色代表力量和耐性.

list.abs: In heraldry , yellow indicates honor and loyalty ., 在纹章学中 , 黄色象征光荣与忠诚.

entry.def: Heraldry is the study of coats of arms and of the history of the families who are entitled to have them.

means.word_mean: 1. the study and classification of armorial bearings and the tracing of genealogies
2. emblem indicating the right of a person to bear arms
